definition: sit on the mountain and watch the tigers fight/watch in safety whilst others fight then reap the rewards when both sides are exhausted (idiom)
to sit/to take a seat/to take (a bus, airplane etc)/to bear fruit/variant of 座[zuo4]
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
to fight/to struggle/to condemn/to censure/to contend/to put together/coming together

sentences.english: Teacher wang is smile Mimi "will sit quietly."
sentences.chinese: 王老師正在笑咪咪的的“坐山觀虎鬥”。
